name: Vector to Label
title: Vector to Label
description: Create labelled masks from flow-field vectors.
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov), Najib Ishaq (najib.ishaq@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.description: Image-name pattern to use when selecting images for processing.

inputs.description: The minimum flow magnitude at a pixel for it to be considered part of a cell. Defaults to 0.1
